dev\/documentation_plugin.md.Comme vu plus haut vous devez juste indi: As seen above you just have to indicate in the info file

dev\/documentation_plugin.md.github (seul méthode que nous verrons ic: github (only method we will see here)
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.Le plus simple pour votre documentation: The easiest way for your documentation is to use the github page system which has the advantage of being very easy to use
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.Github support asciidoc et markedown (md: Github asciidoc and markedown (md) support for pages, we will only see markedown here
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.On ne va pas vous decrire la syntaxe com: We will not describe the complete markdown syntax to you, other sites already do this very well,
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.Nous vous recommandons dans votre plugin: We recommend in your plugin (hosted on github) to make a folder and copy the files and directory from the docs folder into the template plugin (see
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.Une fois cela fait vous allez avoir dans: Once done you will have in the docs folder a folder fr_FR (the only one to modify)
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.Dans ce dossier nous vous conseillons de: In this folder we advise you to make 2 files
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.La mise en ligne est assez simple il suf: Getting online is quite simple, in your github repository then "Settings" and in the "GitHub Pages" part, activate that on "master branch / docs folder" (as indicated by the wording only the files in the folder / docs of the master branch of your plugin will be online)
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.io\/plugin-template\/\" (au bout de quel: io / plugin-template / "(after a few minutes going over it you should see your documentation layout correctly)
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.Il vous faut maintenant mettre les liens: Now you need to put the links of your documentation in the info file
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.json de votre plugin pour cela il faut: json of your plugin for that it is necessary
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.Vous l'aurez compris lorsque l'utilisate: You will understand when the user will ask to see your jeedom doc or the market will automatically replace # language # with the user's language to point to the correct language (if your documentation is not available in the language of the user then automatically it will return to French)
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.Si votre plugin est structuré comme cons: If your plugin is structured as advice above then the translation management is very simple to set up in addition to being automatic, just authorize the user github zoic21 to push / pull on your repository and in the market on the edition page of your plugin in the github tab to check "Activate the generation of documentation and translation
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.Le robot passe tous les jours à 12h (plu: The robot goes every day at 12 noon (more or less 2 hours depending on the workload) to retrieve the French documentation of your plugin and the changelog (beta branch) push it on transiflex (community translation system), retrieve the news translation and push it on your github repository in the right folders
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.Pour que la partie gestion de la traduct: For the translation management part to work automatically, your plugin must be hosted on Github
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.A noter qu'une fois votre fichier info: Note that once your info file
dev\/documentation_plugin.md.com) ajoutera automatiquement votre plug: com) will automatically add your plugin
